page.title: 20Caversham and Sonning Guides
page.content:
At{Forbury Gardens in Reading}on 20th June 1985 all the Guides and Brownies in the district met there for a big{candlelit ceremony.}One big candle went all round Britain on a train and lit a Commissioner's candle. She lit the Division Commissioners' candles, they lit the Guiders' candles and then they lit the Guides' or Brownies candles.
The girls who took part in this survey were aged 11 or 12 and were : Nicola Collings Rebecca Harper Kimberley Cooper Melanie Heale Sara Copeland Cheryl McLeary Katrina Double Rachel Morgan Victoria Doughty Karen Owen Shirani Fernando Sally Robbins Tracy Gilks Sian Walker
